item.description:
Come join us for a good time and for some laughs. This will be the first Meetup for the new year.
All levels are welcomed and if you have not attended a Meetup yet make it your New Years resolution to attend some this year.

Ciao,

John Amato
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign on the table.
item.why: I feel we have a great group of people who keep coming. Our group seems to be consistent with the attendance and all are becoming friends.

group.name: The Rhode Island Italian Language Meetup Group

item.name: PARLIAMO ITALIANO A BREWED AWAKENINGS!!!
